message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. While I can't disclose all the details at this point, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for a price of $1500000.  This is a substantial discount from its true potential value. If you're interested in exploring this opportunity further, I'd be happy to provide more information.  Let me know your thoughts.
